alert.note: Alert for Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:12PM EDT until August 08 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Turner County in south central Georgia... Northern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 512 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leesburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ashburn, Worth, Terrell, Sycamore, Warwick, Rebecca, Amboy, Sibley, Inaha, Coverdale, Hobby, Turner Co Airport, Dakota, Doles and Oakfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
